title: Ratio of government expenditure to gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Mexico 2024
yAxis: Ratio of government expenditure to GDP
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Ratio of government expenditure to GDP, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2021 to 2014.
But, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2024 to 2021.
gold: The statistic shows the ratio of government expenditure to the gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Mexico from 2014 to 2018 , with projections up until 2024 . In 2018 , government expenditure in Mexico amounted to 25.67 percent of the gross domestic product .
